title: Leftwards Hand Medium Skin Tone
description: A hand pointing to the left with a medium skin tone. Used to indicate direction, draw attention to something on the left, or as a subtle gesture of disagreement or dismissal.
apple_vendor_description: The leftwards hand emoji on Apple devices showcases a warm, medium skin tone rendered with Apple's signature soft gradients and subtle 3D shading. Its rounded fingers and palm are illuminated by realistic lighting, giving it a friendly, approachable feel. This emoji, with its gentle curve and polished appearance on Apple devices, is commonly used to indicate direction, a gentle push, or to signal approval and agreement.
